name: Create Own Super-Hero Woman - Free Character Costume Maker Dress-Up Game
name_original: Create Own Super-Hero Woman - Free Character Costume Maker Dress-Up Game
description:
Love Super Hero of famous comics and anime? They are back!
Create and Design your own Super Girl and Super-Woman!
Feeling Excited After Watching the Latest anime? Can't stop thinking about Superwoman Hero? Get this App Now!
Choose from a huge selection of costumes, masks, and more and make your very own character!

The combinations allow for seemingly endless fun!

- Hundreds of Superwoman Combinations
- Hours of Fun!
- Really Easy to Use!
- Fun for Kids and Adults!
- Save the Hero on your device
